divs: sighting detailsnoticed noisy helicopter above when walking dogs at approx 10pm (even brought out my husband to see helicopter circling so close to our home). walked one block over in neighborhood, turned around and saw bright orange glowing light coming closer. after observing it getting bigger\coming closer, the orb disappeared. went back 10 min later to see if i could find it again but it could not be located (helicopter was also gone). wondering if helicopter was there for our safety and warning orb to stay away? no photographic evidence but looking for other witnesses who saw the same orange light. saw that orange lights were reported over tj on last night so might be related.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were 2 other sightings in San Diego on or around September 21st 2012
